Title: Irrational Treasure
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), David Slack (story), Timothy McKeon, Alex Hirsch
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Jackie Buscarino
Plot: The kids try to expose Pacifica Northwest's fraudulent claim that her great-grandfather was the founder of Gravity Falls. Meanwhile, Mabel tries to prove that she can be serious, but learns...
